rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with traditional Chettinad motifs and natural stone finishes. Incorporates local materials, adhering to Vastu principles by ensuring proper alignment of doors for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious room with modern furnishing fused with traditional Chettinad designs. Includes a central seating area that overlooks the courtyard, promoting communal living and social interaction as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Well-equipped kitchen with modern appliances integrated into traditional design elements, positioned in the southeast corner to harness auspicious energies according to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area offering a functional dining space that overlooks the courtyard. Decorative elements ensure a harmonious balance between modern functionality and Chettinad aesthetics.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A compact guest bedroom with traditional Chettinad detailing, located near the entrance for easy access. It also incorporates local architectural elements such as carved wooden doors and stone accents.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Features a traditional Chettinad archway with decorative patterns, ensuring secure entry. The entrance is aligned along the northern edge to enhance auspicious energy flow as per Vastu.

openings.name: Courtyard Access
openings.description: A large central opening that connects the living room to the courtyard. This facilitates natural light and ventilation, aligning with both modern design and traditional Vastu principles.

openings.name: Garden Entrance
openings.description: Provides access from the living area to a large garden designed to embrace nature. The gateway is West-facing as per the plot orientation, ensuring proper alignment with local building norms and Vastu.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: A discreet entrance for household staff and deliveries, positioned away from main living areas to maintain privacy while aligning with traditional design concepts.

notes: The villa is designed as a split-level studio apartment, offering both modern amenities and traditional Chettinad aesthetics. The layout integrates local building norms, ensuring a balance between contemporary comfort and cultural heritage.
The central courtyard serves not only as a focal point for communal activities but also aids in natural ventilation and light distribution, essential to Vastu principles.
All rooms are oriented considering the West-facing plot to maximize the benefits of natural elements while maintaining privacy and security.
